body:
Comment 3: 
In this window as I type, Comment #1 (from rsc@elgoog.com) shows a space instead of a
sigma, although the sigma is actually there - I can copy it and display it in another
window.

Safari 5.1.4 on Lion 10.7.3. I don't know if it's worth even complaining about this,
given the ridiculous number of pieces of software involved, but that's the story.
